LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_ChargingStation.desc: A station built to charge up to 8 adjacent pawns simultaneously.
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_ChargingStation_Fram: A station built to charge up to 8 adjacent pawns simultaneously.
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_BedsideCharger.label: bedside charger
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_BedsideCharger.descr: A bedside device that allows the occupant of the linked bed to charge. It provides energy while in bed, but consumes a lot of power to do so. It must be placed directly adjacent to and facing the head of the bed.
LanguageData.ABF_Thing_Synstruct_BedsideCharger_Frame: A bedside device that allows the occupant of the linked bed to charge. It provides energy while in bed, but consumes a lot of power to do so. It must be placed directly adjacent to and facing the head of the bed.
